short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your photos into tilt-shift style miniatures

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tilt-shift miniature style photos are pictures of real-life scenes that are manipulated to look like model photographs.

Now you can easily transform your existing digital camera photos into tilt-shift style miniatures using tiltshiftmaker.

**** Please note: 
TiltShiftMaker can be used for free without signing up (for download resolutions up to 2000 pixels width/height) - simply upload your photo using the form on  the page or try one of the demo photos. ****

A paid membership version of the site offers high res. downloads (up to 21MP) and additional bokeh options.

TiltShiftMaker uses an all-Javascript interface so can be used on energy efficient devices such as ChromeBooks and NetBooks - even with very large images.


** New in version 1.3 **

- New Bokeh Boost option allows for beautiful bokeh highlights and shapes, especially in night photos
- New Large mode preview option for easier editing
- Redesigned photo editing page and new membership option for unlimited hi-res downloads (up to 21 megapixels) and access to all 54 bokeh styles
